Name: Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey - Resource Management Simulator
About the game: Take the journey of a lifetime with Thor and the Vikings! Go to Ancient Greece and help Thor, Hercules’ daughter Alexia, and the other warriors save Midgard from Fenrir. Fenrir, a giant wolf, is ready to destroy Midgard and all its inhabitants in his rage. Follow Fenrir’s story and explore the source of his immense anger as he sets off on a path of destruction. Discover a thrilling story and find out what made Fenrir so angry that he has resolved to destroy Midgard. Are you ready to join the Vikings on their epic quest to defeat the Minotaur? You’ll have to prove your worth by solving the Gods’ puzzles. Embark on an unforgettable adventure as you join the Vikings in their mission to bring peace back to the world! Get ready to embark on a journey to the mythical world of Olympus! Go on Zeus’ quest and find a special flower for the goddess Calypso. Along the way, you will explore the mysterious underworld, meet Hades, and uncover secrets about Cerberus. Enjoy over 70 thrilling levels and BONUS puzzles! Get beautiful wallpapers! Enjoy stunning full HD graphics! Explore new locations, quests, and puzzles!
